page.title: 05TARRINGTON C E SCHOOL
page.content: The School was built in 1874 at a cost of Â£2777.There are two classrooms and a hall.There are 2 classes,with 8 children in one and 15 in the other. There are 15 boys and 8 girls.In the infants class are 5 boys and 3 girls, and 9 boys and 6 girls in the junior class. There is a playground and a good sized playing field. The school has a headteacher and an assistant teacher. On Mondays the children go to Ledbury Baths, and on Tuedsay they go to Much Marcle School for organised games. There are no school meals,all the children eat sandwiches at midday. Most of the children walk to school, others come in private cars,there is no organised transport.
